Y claro, los dos eran enclaves imprescindibles de la reforma, así que los quería descansaditos y sanos y que se dejaran los dos de delirios penitentes. Entonces ella lo deja súper claro, que tienen que ser mínimo 6 h de sueño. Poco me parece claro. Y en octubre es mucho más clara y le dice a yo le digo que tiene razón Dios de dejarle dormir. Ha me he caído muy en gracia, porque desde que se fue vuestra paternidad se lo he pedido encarecidamente y rogado, pareciéndome cosa necesaria. Siquiera con ese dormir se pasará el trabajo. Although it is true that in her letters she declares again and again that she is old and tired, she does not hesitate always to indoctrinate her confessors, friends and family about the importance of good rest, because she was very judicious. In 1577, Teresa has a health crisis due to overwork and that leads her to be terribly worried about the rest of her brother Lorenzo and also of Jerónimo Gracián. And of course, both were essential enclaves of the reform, so she wanted them rested and healthy, and she wanted them both to stop their penitent delusions. To his brother Lorenzo, on February 10, 1577, he said directly to him in his sleep, I say, and I still command, that it should not be less than 6 hours. Look that it is necessary, those of us who are already of age, to carry these bodies so that they do not break the spirit, which is terrible work.
